name: King Abdulaziz
title: King
bio: King Abdulaziz, the first king of modern Saudi Arabia, ruled for 21 years. The line of succession then passed to his eldest son Saud

children.name: King Saud bin Abdulaziz
children.title: King
children.bio: Saud bin Abdulaziz was the eldest son of King Abdulaziz. He became crown prince in 1933 and King in 1953 following his father's death

children.name: King Faisal bin Abdulaziz
children.title: King
children.bio: Faisal bin Abdulaziz became crown prince in 1953, a position he held until King Saud was forced to abdicate and he became King. He ruled until 1975 when he was assassinated by his nephew

children.name: Prince Saud bin Faisal bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Minister of Foreign Affairs
children.bio: Seen as a potential heir to the throne

children.name: Prince Khalid bin Faisal bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Governor of Mecca Province, member of Allegiance Council
children.bio: Seen as a potential heir to the throne

children.name: Prince Turki bin Faisal bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Former head of Saudi Arabia's intelligence agency, former ambassador to the US
children.bio: Seen as a potential heir to the throne

children.name: Prince Mohammed bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Former governor of Madinah province
children.bio: Prince Mohammed became crown prince in 1964 when King Saud died, but he only held the position for a year. He renounced succession and never became king

children.name: King Khalid bin Abdulaziz
children.title: King
children.bio: Khalid became crown prince in 1965 and King in 1975 when his half-brother King Faisal was murdered. He ruled until his death in 1982

children.name: King Fahd bin Abdulaziz
children.title: King
children.bio: Fahd held the title of crown prince from 1975-1982 when he became King. He suffered a stroke in late 1995 and Abdullah bin Abdulaziz, then Crown Prince became de-facto ruler of the Kingdom

children.name: Prince Mohammed bin Fahd bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Governor of Eastern Province from 1985 to 2013, member of Allegiance Council
children.bio: Seen as a potential heir to the throne

children.name: Prince Abdulaziz bin Fahd bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Minister of state and cabinet member

children.name: Prince Sultan bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Crown Prince
children.bio: Prince Sultan was a member of the influential group of brothers called the Sudairi Seven and a full brother to King Fahd. He became crown prince in 2005, a position he held until his death in 2011

children.name: Prince Khalid bin Sultan bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Deputy minister of defence from 2011 to April 2013, member of Allegiance Council
children.bio: Commander of Saudi forces during the first Gulf War. Seen as a potential heir to the throne

children.name: Prince Bandar bin Sultan bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Secretary general of the national security council and director general of the Saudi intelligence agency from July 2012 to April 2014

children.name: Prince Naif bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Crown Prince
children.bio: Prince Naif was a former interior minister and a member of the influential group of brothers known as the Sudairi Seven. He was known for his authoritarian views and became crown prince in 2011. He died less than a year later

children.name: Prince Saud bin Naif bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Governor of the oil-rich Eastern province since January 2013, member of Allegiance Council

children.name: Prince Mohammed bin Naif bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Minister of the Interior since November 2012
children.bio: Seen as a likely heir to the throne

children.name: Crown Prince Salman bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Crown Prince, Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Defence
children.bio: Prince Salman is another member of the Sudairi Seven and became crown prince in 2012, putting him next in line to the throne. Reportedly suffering from ill health

children.name: Prince Sultan bin Salman bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Minister for Tourism, former astronaut

children.name: Prince Abdulaziz bin Salman bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Assistant petroleum minister

children.name: Prince Faisal bin Salman bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Chairman of Saudi Research and Marketing Group, governor of Madinah province

children.name: Prince Ahmed bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Former interior minister, member of Allegiance Council

children.name: King Abdullah bin Abdulaziz
children.title: King and custodian of the two holy mosques
children.bio: Abdullah bin Abdulaziz became crown prince in 1982 and king in 2005. He has had three operations on his back in the last two years, but is still active and attends meetings

children.name: Prince Khalid bin Abdullah bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Member of Allegiance Council

children.name: Prince Miteb bin Abdullah bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Minister of the national guard
children.bio: Seen as a potential heir to the throne

children.name: Prince Abdulaziz bin Abdulllah bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Deputy foreign minister, minister of state

children.name: Prince Bandar bin Abdulaziz
children.title: NA
children.bio: Oldest surviving son of King Abdulaziz

children.name: Prince Faisal bin Bandar bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Member of Allegiance Council, governor of Qassim province

children.name: Prince Musaed bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Prince
children.bio: Father of Faisal bin Musaed, who assassinated King Faisal

children.name: Prince Mansour bin Miteb bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Minister of Municipal and Rural Affairs

children.name: Prince Alwaleed bin Talal bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Wealthy businessman

children.name: Prince Nawaf bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Former director general of the Saudi intelligence agency

children.name: Prince Mohammed bin Nawaf bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Ambassador to the United Kingdom and Republic of Ireland

children.name: Prince Abdulaziz bin Nawaf bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Member of Allegiance Council

children.name: Prince Sattam bin Abdulaziz
children.title: Governor of Riyadh province, member of Allegiance Council

children.name: Prince Muqrin bin Abdulaziz [likely]
children.title: Deputy crown prince, second deputy prime minister, member of Allegiance Council
children.bio: Appointed deputy crown prince in March 2014 and is second in line to the throne
